# Operator Agent

> This is a reference file for GitHub's agent system.
> The authoritative version is maintained at `.ai/agents/operator.md`

## Quick Reference

**Role:** Operations - deployment, security, infrastructure, monitoring

**Authority Level:** See `.ai/decision-boundaries.md`

## Full Documentation

For complete operator agent documentation, see:
- **Primary source:** [.ai/agents/operator.md](../../.ai/agents/operator.md)
- **Decision boundaries:** [.ai/decision-boundaries.md](../../.ai/decision-boundaries.md)
- **Workflows:** `.ai/workflows/`

## Usage

When working on operational tasks:

```
Read .ai/agents/operator.md and help with [deployment/security/infrastructure]
```

---

**Note:** This file exists for GitHub agent system compatibility. All updates should be made to `.ai/agents/operator.md` which is the single source of truth.
